definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]

sentences.english: When Taking Occasional Pain Relievers Leads to an Ulcer
sentences.chinese: 偶然服用消炎药导致溃疡。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the efficacy of topical non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) in the treatment of osteoarthritis (OA).
sentences.chinese: 目的评价外用非甾体类消炎药治疗骨关节炎的疗效。

sentences.english: Which kinds of antiphlogistic drug should department of gynaecology drink after urgent clear palace?
sentences.chinese: 妇科急清宫后应该喝哪种消炎药呢？

sentences.english: Voice agnail, take antiphlogistic drug allergic, how to do?
sentences.chinese: 嗓子发炎了，吃消炎药又过敏，怎么办？

sentences.english: You know how aspirin and acetominophen are anti-inflammatories?
sentences.chinese: 你知道阿斯匹林和消炎药是怎样发挥抗炎作用的吗？

sentences.english: Before the teeth implant procedure, you need to take anti-inflammatories.
sentences.chinese: 植牙之前，你需要吃消炎药。

sentences.english: Are you selling vitamins, aspirin or antibiotics?
sentences.chinese: 你是销售维他命，阿司匹林，还是消炎药？

sentences.english: A sleepless night, anti-inflammatory medicine two day saw little effect.
sentences.chinese: 阿加一夜难眠，消炎药吃了两天总算见了点效。

definition: antipyretic tablet (to reduce fever), such as sulfanilamide
antipyretic (drug to reduce fever, such as sulfanilamide)
